text: The Museu de Arte de Santa Catarina (MASC), was created in 1949 as Museu de Arte Moderna de Florianópolis (MAMF), and, since then, is the official institution for fine arts in Santa Catarina. ==References== ==External links== *Santa Catarina Art Museum Category:Art museums and galleries in Brazil Category:Museums in Santa Catarina (state) Category:Art museums established in 1949 Category:1949 establishments in Brazil
title: Santa Catarina Art Museum
